title.en: A Brief Prayer of Aspiration for Mind Training

text.en: By the truth of the perfect mind of awakening
Generated by the supreme noble Lord Avalokiteśvara
And all the buddhas and bodhisattvas,
May the supreme mind of bodhicitta be born
In me and in all other beings, as limitless as space.
May the causes and effects of beings' suffering—
text.en-trans: semchen duk nga la zhuk dang

text.en: Their involvement with the five poisons,
And painful experiences in the six classes,
All ripen on me! To them all, as limitless as space,
text.en-trans: dak gi chin druk sem dang ni

text.en: I offer the six perfections in my own mind,
And sources of virtue, free from the five poisons.
May all the realms of saṃsāra's six classes be emptied,
text.en-trans: rik druk khorwé né tong né

text.en: And may everyone attain the level of Avalokiteśvara,
In his six sublime families and with six types of wisdom.
May all disease, famine, belligerence, wrong views,
text.en-trans: né muk tsön kal lokpar té

text.en: Impairments, transgressions, downfalls, harmful actions,
Self-cherishing, obstacles, harmful influences and impediments,
All ripen on me and me alone!
And to all these beings, who are as limitless as space
text.en-trans: tsé pal long chö dekyi tu

text.en: I dedicate long-life, glory, wealth, happiness, power,
Experience, realisation, and knowing, loving wisdom.
May they all, through supreme enlightened actions,
text.en-trans: kün kyang changchub chö chok gi

text.en: Attain the level of the most splendid Noble One!
text.en-trans: rab dzé pakpé né tob shok

text.en: In short, may all the causes and effects
Of egotism and self-cherishing ripen on me!
And may all beings gain a wealth of benefit and happiness,
text.en-trans: dro kün pendé pal gyi jor

text.en: And realise the meaning of emptiness and compassion!
May all beings, especially those who harm me, or who have developed a negative connection
text.en-trans: dak la tong tö dren rek gi

text.en: Through seeing, hearing, thinking of, or encountering me,
text.en-trans: ngen drel nöjé tso jé dro

text.en: Purify their obscurations, enter the path to enlightenment,
text.en-trans: drib jang changchub lam zhuk né

text.en: And attain awakening straightaway!
text.en-trans: tokma nyi du tsang gya shok

text.en: May I take the place of those experiencing the cause and effect
text.en-trans: shin du mi zé lé ngen gyi

text.en: Of unbearable, extremely negative acts,
And may they all purify obscurations
And be born in realms of perfect bliss!
text.en-trans: drib jang dechen zhing kyé shok

text.en: For the sake of all, but especially those who harm me,
text.en-trans: nöjé tsor gyur dro kün dön

text.en: May I remain only in the lower realms,
And may all beings, my very own mothers,
text.en-trans: magen dro kün khor tso lé

text.en: Escape samsara's ocean to reach liberation's shore.
text.en-trans: drol né namdrol sar jor shok

text.en: The only basis for bodhicitta—
Kind enemies and harmful forces—
For your sake, I shall gladly give away
text.en-trans: chirdu dak gi lü dang sok

text.en: My body and my life—may you be benefitted!
text.en-trans: ga zhin tang né pen drub shok

text.en: When I attain complete enlightenment,
May you become the first in my circle,
text.en-trans: khor gyi tokmar khyö kyé né

text.en: And, just like the five original disciples,
Attain omniscience there and then!
From now until I attain enlightenment,
May I never be apart from you who do me harm,
And with calm, untroubled view and conduct,
May we set out together on the path to enlightenment.
text.en-trans: changchub lam la nyam juk shok

text.en: May those who see me, hear me or think of me,
And also those who merely hear my name,
text.en-trans: dak gi ming tsam töpa dang

text.en: Or are simply touched by the same breath of wind,
text.en-trans: dzi chok lung gi rekpa yang

text.en: Discard their obscurations and enter the way to peace!
text.en-trans: drib zé zhiwé lam juk shok

text.en: All beings are my own parents, as limitless as space,
So how could I ever feel hostility towards them?
Wishing only to repay their kindness, and acting gently,
May I bring them, all at once, to enlightenment!
May beings never be harmed on my account,
text.en-trans: dak la ten né ngö gyü du

text.en: Whether directly or indirectly,
And, through bringing them only benefit and happiness,
May I lead them all to the state of perfect bliss!
text.en-trans: dechen sa la gö nü shok

text.en: In each and every instant, may all limitless beings,
With skill in the means of liberation and the force of compassion,
Become just like Avalokiteśvara, Mañjuśrī,
And Vajrapāṇi, the Lord of Secrets.
May those who suffer and are difficult to tame,
Receive special loving care and guidance,
And may the compassionate prayers and aspirations
Of the Supreme Sage and the Lotus Born come true!
text.en-trans: tuk kyé mönlam zhin gyur chik

text.en: In the wisdom space of the equality of self and other,
Through the dawning of emptiness and compassion's power,
Just so the benefit of others may be secured,
May this prayer of aspiration swiftly be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: mönlam tab zhin nyur drub shok
